identity.mission: Create a top 1% legal SaaS interface that blends 'Old Money' authority with 'High-Tech' efficiency. No generic templates.
principles: Fusion: Legal Tradition (Serif/Gold) x Cyber Security (Dark Mode/Neon Traces)
Content: Data is the hero. Legibility is paramount.
RTL First: Every decision must prioritize the Arabic reading flow.

rules: Sidebar must be on the RIGHT.
Icons (arrows, chevrons) must be mirrored (e.g., 'chevron-left' becomes 'next').
Flex containers must use 'flex-row-reverse' if not natively handling RTL, or rely on logical properties (ms-*, me-*).
Tables: First column is on the RIGHT.

cards.base: bg-[#111827] border border-white/5 relative overflow-hidden group

inputs.style: bg-black/20 border-white/10 focus:border-[#D4AF37] focus:ring-1 focus:ring-[#D4AF37] text-right placeholder:text-right

navigation.sidebar: w-64 bg-[#0B0F19] border-l border-white/10 h-screen fixed right-0 top-0 z-50
navigation.topbar: h-16 bg-[#0B0F19]/80 backdrop-blur-md border-b border-white/10 sticky top-0 z-40

auth_page.form_side: w-full lg:w-1/2 flex items-center justify-center bg-[#0B0F19]

universal_guidelines: DO NOT use gradients for backgrounds. Use solid deep colors + noise/texture.
DO NOT center text in cards. Align Right (for Arabic).
Ensure 'dir=rtl' is set on the root HTML element.
English numbers in Arabic text are acceptable and standard in technical fields.
instructions_to_main_agent: You are building the 'KM Legal System'. Start by setting up the global CSS for RTL and the Dark Theme variables. Then build the Layout (Sidebar/Header). Then implement the Dashboard with the Bento Grid. Finally, build the Case Management and Document views. Use the provided image URLs. STRICTLY FOLLOW THE COLOR PALETTE.
